name: Astro Shoot: PC Version
description:
WHAT IS ASTRO SHOOT?

Astro Shoot is a simple arcade space-shooter where you have the task of defeating all the enemies!

 HOW DOES IT WORK?

By pressing WASD you will be able to move the spaceship.

 Instead, by pressing the left mouse button you can fire lasers 

to destroy enemies!

 SKIN

There are various skins in the game to use in the game!

Every now and then new skins will be added and they will

be completely free from the start!
